title: Regal Jaisalmer Glamping Escape near Sand Dunes with All-Inclusive Dining
description: At Karwaan Jaisalmer, located in Rajasthan, a magnificent fusion of the old and new awaits with a one-of-a-kind glamping experience. This stunning resort is perfectly surrounded by majestic sand dunes and splashed with Rajasthani culture, and is an overnight drive from the cities of Delhi and Jaipur. Throughout the property, you will find a stunning pool, beautifully designed cottages and camps where you can rest in a luxurious setting, and at Mehfils, the hotel's multi-cuisine restaurant, you can savour exquisite dishes that are expertly slow-cooked in real earthen clay pots. When it's time to step out of this beautiful cocoon of grandeur, the Jaisalmer Fort, local bazaars, and Gadisar Lake will welcome and impress you as you immerse yourself in Rajasthani culture.
offer_address: Khasra No.19, Post Kanoi, Tehsil, Jaisalmer, Gram Kanoi, Jaisalmer, Rajasthan 345001 India

title: Jaisalmer Thar Desert Glamping with Daily Dining & Camel Safari
description: Scattered across the sun-kissed dunes of the Thar Desert in Rajasthan, Kanak Jaisalmer offers a unique camping experience. Thanks to its luxurious glamping tents with air conditioning, private bathrooms and desert-view terraces, Kanak Jaisalmer is the best way to experience this majestic part of India. Just 15 hours from Delhi and 11 hours from Jaipur and Ahmedabad, this rustic paradise takes you on the adventure of a lifetime. From dune bashing to camel rides and simply taking in a breathtaking sunset in the desert - you're guaranteed a truly unforgettable experience.

title: Regal Jaisalmer Glamping Escape near Sand Dunes with All-Inclusive Dining
description: Immerse yourself in the magic of Rajasthan with a stay at Karwaan Jaisalmer, a luxurious oasis in the heart of the Golden City. This opulent retreat is just a stone's throw from the mesmerising Jaisalmer Fort, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Savour authentic Rajasthani cuisine at the hotel's rooftop restaurant, offering panoramic views of the city's golden sandstone architecture. Venture beyond the hotel to explore the Sam Sand Dunes, enjoy a thrilling camel safari or shop for intricate handicrafts at the bustling local bazaars.
offer_address: Khasra No.19, Post Kanoi, Tehsil, Jaisalmer, Gram Kanoi, Jaisalmer, Rajasthan 345001 India

title: Ultra-Luxe Thar Desert Escape with Indulgent Dining
description:
Pamper yourself at Suryagarh Jaisalmer, a majestic resort resembling a typical Rajasthani fort. Your gateway to the magnificent Thar Desert, Suryagarh Jaisalmer offers a magical escape taking you back in time. Just an overnight drive from Delhi and Ahmedabad, this rustic retreat welcomes you with its perfect marriage of heritage features and contemporary facilities. Enjoy your escape with daily chef's choice breakfast, one chef's choice dinner each, once during the stay, one glass of beer or wine per adult, once during the stay, a chef's special coffee and cake session, once during the stay, 20% discount on Ã  la carte dining and spa treatments, and complimentary Wi-Fi.

**Travelling with family?** Two children (aged five years and under) stay free on existing bedding and with all inclusions (excludes alcohol).
offer_address: Kahala Phata, Sam - Dhanana Rd, Jaisalmer, Rajasthan 345001
